content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->7

This is the shortest path from node 12 to node 6 in the graph. Please note that the path is represented as a sequence of nodes, where each node is followed by the next node in the sequence.

6->7->12

This is the shortest path from node 6 to node 12 in the graph. Please note that the path is represented as a sequence of nodes, where each node is followed by the next node in the sequence.
